==========
Tutorials
==========

These documents state all the particularities of the four main classes of py_pol: Jones_vector, Jones_matrix, Stokes and Mueller. There is also a fifth tutorial centered in the representation of polarization states (Jones_vector and Stokes).

   :numbered:
   :glob:

   source/tutorial/Jones_matrix.ipynb
   source/tutorial/Stokes.ipynb
   source/tutorial/Mueller.ipynb
   source/tutorial/Drawing_docs.ipynb
